name: UpdateCommercePayment
description:
Partially update a commerce payment by ID or unique property.

Use this tool to perform a partial update of a commerce payment object identified by its internal ID or a unique property specified by `idProperty`. Ensure provided property values exist and are not read-only; this will overwrite them. To clear a value, pass an empty string.

parameters.name: commerce_payment_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the commerce payment to update. This ID identifies the specific payment object within the system.

parameters.name: commerce_payment_update_properties
parameters.description: A JSON object containing key-value pairs for properties to update in the commerce payment. Include only existing and writable properties. Use empty strings to clear values.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: The name of a unique property for identifying the object. Use this if not using the default internal ID.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
